Text:
i have now blocked your popup script ridden img host.
If you try to get around the block with lame redirects or anything similar you will soon find your account banned and your torrents removed. 
There are many other good clean img hosts out there, one even runned by TPB :

http://bayimg.com/
Nice work done. All the img hosts used by the VIP porn uploaders is filled with pop ups and pop unders.  Its wrong when my host has pop ups? Again nice work.
